markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=418) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=523)

</column>

---

Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a Twin Riposte. You can use this extra reaction even if you are not benefiting from Twin Parry.
name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
